          <title>
            <string language="en">Seeing over a wall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen über eine Wand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voir au-dessus d'un mur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ver sobre uma parede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vedendo sopra una parete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να δει πέρα από έναν τοίχο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ver sobre una pared</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the mirrors in a periscope used to see objects over a wall.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of reflection</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Spiegel in einem 
Periscope, der benutzt wird, um Nachrichten über einer Wand zu sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les miroirs dans un 
périscope utilisé pour voir des objets au-dessus d'un mur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra os espelhos em um periscope 
usado ver objetos sobre uma parede.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra gli specchi in un periscope 
utilizzato per vedere gli oggetti sopra una parete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τους καθρέφτες σε ένα 
περισκόπιο που χρησιμοποιείται για να δει τα 
αντικείμενα πέρα από έναν τοίχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra los espejos en un 
periscopio usado para considerar objetos sobre una pared.</string>
          </description>
